Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurring before any rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled' without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' executions that are part of the most frequent variant (i.e., the variant with frequency 4618)
Metric: the average of the function base == 4618 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' compared to the total frequency of all approval activities ('Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is immediately followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that occur in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that result in a rejection downstream (by any role)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases that undergo re-submission after an initial rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that are not followed by any further approval step (i.e., directly go to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Ratio of the number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to the number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that do not contain any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that precede a path leading to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all rejections by PRE_APPROVER that are preceded by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases that eventually reach 'Payment Handled' versus those that end in rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that avoid any rejection loop
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Ratio of successful completions (ending in 'Payment Handled') after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to the total occurrences of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
